altTitles.ja: スライムライフ

description.en: The stories of the everyday life of a black mage and a slime that run a magic store together as master and servant.

altTitles.ja: 夢色パティシエール

description.en:
Amano Ichigo is a clumsy 14-year-old girl whose only "outstanding" trait is an incomparable love of sweets. Constantly overshadowed by her near genius-pianist little sister, Ichigo looked forward to a Sweets Festival to lift her spirits a bit; and lo and behold, a taste takes her by the tongue, leading her to Henri Lucas- a world-famous master patissier. She's not the only one enthralled; Henri is sure she's someone amazing, and gives her a recommendation to St. Marie Academy, a school famous for turning out master patissieres!  
  
No sooner than she transfers, Ichigo finds herself amongst the biggest big-shots of the entire middle school, and faced with more troubles than her klutzy self is quite ready to handle. But with the help of her "Sweets Spirit" Vanilla… who knows what'll be possible?

title.en: Yojouhan Ohi ~Marie Antoinette Tensei Ohi no Yarinaoshi~

altTitles.ja: 四畳半王妃　～マリー・アントワネット　転生王妃のやり直し～

description.en:
'Marie Antoinette came to my room that day...'

A Lolita-loving high school girl and the tragic Queen Marie-Antoinette in modern Japan. Born, raised and raised differently, the encounter between these two girls changes history.
description.ja: 悲劇の王妃マリー・アントワネットは処刑の瞬間。「誰も自分を知らない世界でやり直したい」と願った。その結果、若かりし少女の姿で現代日本に“転生”してしまったようで…？マリーが“転生”した先にいたのは、育ってきた環境から自己肯定感が低く、ロリータファッションを堂々と着こなせない自分を好きになれずにいる女子高生。時代も生まれ育ちも何もかも違う二人が現代日本で出会った時、ロリータファッションを通じて少女と歴史が変わっていく――

altTitles.ja: スケットダンス

description.en:
The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to… concentrate very hard!

- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **SKET DANCE** (2015)

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.ru:
"Скет Данс" - школьный клуб, чья деятельность весьма необычна - помогать в решении абсолютно любых проблем, которые возникли у учеников или даже учителей. А члены этого чудо-клуба, не менее странные личности, чем сам клуб: Боссун - гений дедуктивного мышления, Химэко - боевая единица группы и Свич - "мозг" и хакер мира сего. Вы всегда можете к ним обратиться, если осмелитесь…  
  
- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/kentashinohara_)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=12089)
description.vi:
Tình tiết xoay quanh 3 thanh niên rảnh rỗi của câu lạc bộ SKET (chuyên giải quyết mọi rắc rối cho người khác):
- 1 nam thanh niên ngáo ngơ, chỉ thông minh lúc full trang bị.
- 1 nữ thanh niên lực lưỡng, trâu chó nhất bản đồ.
- 1 nam thanh niên Otaku chỉ nói chuyện qua laptop.

Bao gồm những câu chuyện dở khóc dở cười mà cười có khi rớt hàm mà khóc thì có khi lụt nhà -  và còn chứa rất nhiều oxi drama hít hà bổ phổi (. ❛ ᴗ ❛.)

altTitles.ja: 御羊ちゃんは触りたい

description.en: Oneshot published in January 2025 issue of Yurihime.

altTitles.ja: エンマの休日

description.en:
Lord Emma and Zazel, a close aide, eat while walking!?
With a notebook left by the predecessor Enma the Great as a clue, savor the various gourmet foods of the human world!
"Yo-Kai Watch" official spin-off work supervised by Level-5 is now available!
description.es:
¡El Gran Emma y su asistente cercano, Zazel, comen mientras caminan!?
Con un cuaderno dejado por el predecesor, el padre del Gran Enma, como pista, ¡saborea los diversos alimentos gourmet del mundo humano!
¡El trabajo derivado oficial de "Yo-Kai Watch" supervisado por Level-5 ya está disponible!

description.en:
Han Xiao, a veteran player of the game "Galaxy" died unexpectedly in the middle of doing a leveling request. He was transmitted to the game world ten years earlier and became an NPC with a player's panel and was reborn in the base of the game's villain. In order to survive, Han Xiao resolutely chose the "Mechanic" occupation and concentrated on cultivation. Familiar with the iterations and rules of multiple versions of the game, he vowed to lead the army of machines, overthrow the villains, and rise from scratch to become the strongest.

Alternative RAWs:
[IQIYI](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_1ttzvn5jsqd.html)
[BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30386)

I could kill you if I wanted.
Hale Windsor was a renowned hitman until he is betrayed and loses the love of his life. With nothing left to live for, he begins a war of revenge on the very organization he used to work for. That is, until he meets Marine, a girl who brings color back into his black and white existence.
description.pl: Hayden Windsor był znanym zabójcą, dopóki nie zostaje zdradzony i nie traci miłości swojego życia. Nie mając po co żyć, rozpoczyna wojnę zemsty na organizacji, dla której kiedyś pracował. To znaczy, dopóki nie spotyka Marine, dziewczyny, która przywraca kolor do jego czarno-białej egzyste

altTitles.ja: ハーフサキュバスを拾った

altTitles.es-la: Llevando a casa una medio súcubo

altTitles.vi: Tôi nhặt về nhà một bán Succubus

description.en: Take a child half succubus and half human.
description.id: Mungut anak setengah succubus dan setengah Manusia

description.en: Kwon Yong-jin, a protagonist who doesn’t believe in superstitions, experiences unbelievable events right after his 16th birthday.

title.en: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: Bangaihen - Toaru Kyuuka no Sugoshikata

altTitles.ja: 転生したらスライムだった件　番外編　～とある休暇の過ごし方～

altTitles.en: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime: Extra Story - How to Spend a Certain Vacation

altTitles.ru: О моём перерождении в слизь: Дополнительная история - как провести отпуск

description.en:
**Warning:** This Spinoff manga has spoilers from the Light Novel.

After successfully completing the Founding Festival, which includes meetings with the leaders of various countries, a martial arts tournament, technology presentations, and the unveiling of the underground labyrinth, the peaceful daily life in Tempest has returned. Then, Veldora begins to say, "I'm also thinking of developing magic beasts", and the three of them, including Rimuru and Hinata, who are interested in developing new magic, head for the Magic Tower, the sacred place of magic...?

This work is based on the Light Novel, and the timeline is from the end of Volume 9 to the beginning of Volume 10.
description.ja: 各国首脳との会談や、武闘大会、技術発表会に地下迷宮のお披露目と盛り沢山な内容の開国祭を無事に終え、穏やかな日常が戻ってきた魔国連邦(テンペスト)。そんな中、「我も獣魔術を開発しようと思う」とヴェルドラが言い始め、新魔法の開発に興味を抱いたリムル、そしてヒナタを加えた3人で魔法の聖地・魔塔へ向かうこととなり―――？

title.en: The Story of a Girl Who's My Best Friend, She's Acting Strange Lately

altTitles.ja: 親友の女の子の様子が最近おかしい話

altTitles.ja-ro: Shinyuu no Onnanoko no Yousu ga Saikin Okashii Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of My Best Friend, a Girl Who's Acting Oddly These Days
The Story of a Best Friend, Who is a Girl Acts Odd Nowadays

description.en: My best friend is a girl I have known since elementary school.  She was like a boy, but nowadays she acts odd. We were like two guys, but now... she tries to increase the skinship and gets upset when I speak to girls.

altTitles.ja: 蒼穹のアリアドネ

description.en: Lacile, a human weapon made during the last great war who now lives in isolation, meets Leana a runaway princess from the floating city of Ariadne and becomes her knight of the blue sky. They set off into the outside world, both harboring the dream of seeing what the world has to offer!
description.ru: Манга рассказывает историю одного мальчика, который живет один вдалеке от остальных людей и лелеет одну мечту. Однажды он встречает одинокую девушку, и история начинается, когда он становится частью судьбы девушки.

altTitles.ja: 魔力9999万 全属性使いの大賢者

altTitles.ja-ro: Maryoku 9999 man Zen Zokusei Tsukai no Dai Kenja

description.en:
Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
All over the world, Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from “The Calamity” was “The Great Sage”, Ichikami Atsumu.
But, despite being satisfied in his death, he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself, Kusanagi Minato.
Atsumu, waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future, is shocked to see a peaceful world, and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive.
For now, Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato, but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past, and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles
.After blowing off his bragging, low-levelled bullies, Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl, Mizuha Yuika, as well as his schoolmates and teachers.
What’s more, Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity, which was supposed to have been subdued, will return––
“It looks like my power is still needed”
Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?!
The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace.
With his reincarnation in the future set, the curtain opens on a new Hero’s story!

title.en: No More Regrets, Just Kill Me

altTitles.ja: 後悔はいいから殺してください

altTitles.ja-ro: Koukai wa Ii Kara Koroshite Kudasai

description.en:
Tsukishiro Yuina, a singer who lost her voice in a traffic accident, felt hopeless. In her despair, Yuina chose to end her life, but when she opened her eyes, she found herself in the world of a novel she had read before her death, The Saint Who Abandons Her Status.

She had possessed the body of the novel's villainess, Ariadeline. To make matters worse, it was at the point where the main protagonists were already married, and Ariadeline had been condemned.

Even in the world of the novel, her miserable situation didn't improve. Yuina (now Ariadeline) decided to take her own life again, but this time she was stopped by her former husband, Carlothian.

"I don't want you to die."

Even though he was the one who killed her in the original story, Carlothian repeatedly interfered with Ariadeline's attempts to end her life.

"Why won't you kill me like you did in the original story...?"

Thus begins the tale of the villainess who lost her dream, Ariadeline, and her tsundere former husband, Carlothian, as they attempt to redo their misunderstood love story.

altTitles.ja: がんばっていきまっしょい

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 9 -  The JoJoLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Parte 9 - Las JOJOLandias

altTitles.pl: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Część 9 - The JoJoLands

altTitles.fr: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Partie 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.pt-br: A Estranha Aventura de JoJo, Parte 9: As JoJoLândias

altTitles.it: Le Bizzarre Avventure di JoJo: Le JOJOLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

altTitles.ja-ro: Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru

altTitles.pt: O Aluno Sem Noção Transferido É Assertivo

altTitles.ja: 事情を知らない転校生がグイグイくる。

altTitles.zh-hk: 什麼情況都不知道的轉校生一個勁的湊過來。

altTitles.uk: Цей безглуздий переведений учень такий настирливий (Мій дивакуватий друг)

altTitles.en: The Clueless Transfer Student Is Assertive.

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Primeiro Amigo é um Tapado

description.en: Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.
description.uk: Акане Нішімура — сором’язлива та похмура дівчинка початкової школи, яка через свою зовнішність має безпідставну жахливу репутацію у своєму класі. Тайо Такада — новий учень, який перевівся з невеликої сільської школи, і якому подобається унікальність Нішімури, яку її однокласники використовують, щоб познущатися з неї, вважаючи, що її «темрява» виглядає моторошно. Через нестримну та фундаментальну радість, яку проявляє Такада, будучи її другом, Нішімура починає розуміти, що бути собою не так вже й погано, як вона думала.
description.pt-br: Nishimura é uma garota retraída, hostilizada por todos os colegas por seu jeito sombrio, que dizem até que ela é a Morte em pessoa. Mas isso só chama ainda mais a atenção de Takada, um novo aluno transferido. Sem saber o motivo do apelido, que por sinal ele acha super-maneiro, Takada começa a se aproximar mais e mais da Nishimura para se tornar amigo dela. Uma história cativante, cheia de nostalgia dos nossos tempos de fundamental, sobre uma amizade que vai aquecer seus corações!

altTitles.ja: Fate/school life
氷室の天地 Fate/school life

description.en:
A comedy 4-koma manga revolving around the normal life at school of the minor characters of Fate/stay night and Fate/hollow ataraxia, specifically the character Himuro Kane, classmate of Fate/stay night protagonist Emiya Shirou.  
  
It tells about the normal school life of the supporting characters Himuro Kane, Makidera Kaede and Saegusa Yukika. Other characters are the regular cast of the main games: Mitsuzuri Ayako, Tohsaka Rin, Ryuudou Issei, Matou Shinji, Emiya Shirou, Kuzuki Souichirou, Fujimura Taiga, Matou Sakura, Mitsuzuri Minori; "guest" characters from other series Ciel, Seven, Sajyou Ayaka (formerly the heroine of the never finished prototype novel of Fate/stay night) are also featured, and other classmates Gotou Gai, Fujimoto, Dezaki, Hirumata.  
  
The story is centered around classic school events such as a ball game tournament, field trips and inter high school competitions. As such, there is no reference at all to supernatural things like magecraft and Heroic Spirits.

altTitles.ja: 8月31日のロングサマー

description.en:
Suzuki-kun and Takagi-san — two high-schoolers who found each other in a time loop on August 31. The two are the only ones who keep their memories when it loops. As for the cause of the time loop, one thing comes to mind — Suzuki-kun's lingering regrets for the summer, a guy's greatest ambition....

It's a time loop comedy of youth, romance, and facing love head-on!
___
**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10613/episode/353159)
description.ja:
何度も繰り返す8月31日の中で出会った高校生の二人・鈴木くんと高木さん。

記憶を繰り越せるのは二人だけ。

タイムループの原因として考えられるのは、鈴木くんが夏休みにやり残した、男子最大の目標…。

恋と真っ向から対峙する、青春タイムループコメディ！
description.ru:
31 августа повторяется снова и снова. Сохранить об этом воспоминания могут только два школьника – Сузуки-кун и Такаги-сан. Задумавшись о причине возникновения такой временной петли, Сузуки-кун пришёл к выводу, что всё дело в нём: его незавершённых делах летом и большом сожалении на этот счёт. Чтобы выбраться из временной тюрьмы подросток решает действовать…
Вас ждёт любовная комедия противостояния любви и временной петли!
description.vi: Thế giới bị rơi vào 1 vòng lặp thời gian, chỉ có 2 người giữ lại được ký ức là Suzuki và Takagi. Nếu muốn thoát khỏi vòng lặp thì Suzuki phải hoàn thành ước nguyện còn dang dở của cậu: kiếm được bạn gái và thoát kiếp trai tân.

title.en: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken

altTitles.ja: お隣の天使様にいつの間にか駄目人間にされていた件

altTitles.en: The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten

altTitles.pt-br: Meu Anjo de Vizinha Me Mima Demais

altTitles.pl: Anioł z sąsiedztwa niezwykle mnie rozpieszcza

description.en: Mahiru is a beautiful girl whose classmates all call her an “angel.” Not only is she a star athlete with perfect grades—she’s also drop-dead gorgeous. Amane‚ an average guy and self-admitted slob‚ has never thought much of the divine beauty‚ despite attending the same school. Everything changes‚ however‚ when he happens to see Mahiru sitting alone in a park during a rainstorm. Thus begins the strange relationship between this incredibly unlikely pair!
description.ja: 高校生の藤宮周が住むマンションの隣には、「天使様」と呼ばれる学校で一番の美少女・椎名真昼が住んでいる。特に関わり合いのなかった二人だが、雨の中ずぶ濡れになっていた彼女に傘を貸したことから、不思議な交流が始まった。自堕落な一人暮らしを送る周を見かねて、なにかと世話を焼く真昼。お互いに興味ないと言い合う二人は、それでも少しずつ距離を縮めていく……。
description.pl: Mahiru jest piękną dziewczyną, którą koledzy z klasy nazywają "aniołkiem". Jest nie tylko świetnie wysportowana i ma doskonałe oceny - jest także zabójczo piękna. Amane, przeciętny facet i samozwańczy niechluj, nigdy nie myślał zbyt wiele o tej boskiej piękności, mimo że uczęszczał do tej samej szkoły. Wszystko zmienia się jednak, gdy widzi Mahiru siedzącą samotnie w parku podczas ulewy. Tak zaczyna się dziwna relacja między tą nieprawdopodobną parą!
description.vi: Fujimiya Amane sống một mình trong căn hộ của mình, và cô gái xinh nhất ở trường cậu, Shiina Mahiru, lại là hàng xóm của cậu. Họ hầu như chẳng bao giờ nói chuyện với nhau cho tới một ngày trời mưa cậu thấy cô không cầm theo ô và cho cô mượn. Để cảm ơn thì cô đã thường xuyên giúp anh làm việc nhà, từ đó mối quan hệ của họ bắt đầu nảy nở.
description.pt-br:
Fujimiya Amane, um estudante do ensino médio, mora sozinho em seu apartamento. Ao lado dele mora Shiina Mahiru, a garota mais bonita da escola. Alguém que todos chamam de "anjo". Eles nunca conversam de verdade, mas quando Amane empresta seu guarda-chuva a Mahiru em um dia chuvoso, o relacionamento deles começa a florescer.

Em pouco tempo Mahiru descobre que Amane negligencia sua cozinha e limpeza, e ela se sente obrigada a intervir.

Embora eles não tenham nenhum interesse um pelo outro, eles lentamente se aproximam...

Esta é a história de amor agridoce de um jovem e sua bela vizinha de língua afiada.

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女にあこがれて

description.en:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
description.fr:
**Je fais des choses tellement horribles à mes Magical Girls préférées !**

Moi, c’est Utena Hiiragi, et comme toutes les filles de mon âge, j’adore les magical girls !
Un jour, une étrange créature aux allures de mascotte m’a lancé un sort, et je suis devenue capable de me transformer, moi aussi !
Je vais pouvoir me battre aux côtés de mes héroïnes préférées !
Enfin, c’est ce que je croyais…

C’est quoi, cette tenue scandaleuse ?
Et comment ça, je suis au service du Mal ?!

Mais qu’est-ce que c’est que cette histoire ?!

**La comédie BDSM dans laquelle s’affrontent des Magical Girls !!**

**Avec ses personnages tous plus fous les uns que les autres, Looking Up to Magical Girls balaye les genres et nous place du côté du mal ! Akihiro Ononaka déploie tout l’arsenal BDSM à sa disposition pour nous proposer un concentré d’humour légèrement sexy et complètement déjanté !**

---
**Links:**
- [Official French](https://www.amazon.fr/Looking-up-Magical-Girls-1/dp/2382750731/)
description.uk: Хііраґі Утена завжди захоплювалася чарівними дівчатами і мріяла перетворитися на круту героїню, яка бореться зі злом. Тож, коли одного вечора до неї підходить талісман, яка стверджує, що в ній дрімає магічна сила, вона тремтить від хвилювання. Але її барвиста мрія швидко розбивається об іронічний поворот подій, коли вона перетворюється на лиходійку!
description.es-la:
Hiiragi Utena, una chica que ama a las Chicas Mágicas, vive su vida cotidiana y desea ser como ellas.
Un día aparece un personaje curioso frente a ella y le ofrece el poder de hacer realidad sus deseos, pero...
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, ¡comienza la feroz batalla!
description.pt-br: Hiiragi Utena é uma garota apaixonada por Mahou Shoujo que sonhava em se tornar uma delas e poder lutar ao lado de sua heroína favorita. Certo dia, um mascote inesperadamente apareceu ao seu lado e lançou uma feitiço em Hiiragi, oferecendo a ela a oportunidade de estar de frente para sua ídolo. Entretanto, diferente do que ela esperava, a transformação a fez virar uma vilã ao invés de uma mahou shoujo. Para piorar, a mudança faz com que ela deixe de ser uma tímida garota e passe a ser uma dominatrix sádica. Agora Hiiragi precisará lidar com sua nova “profissão”, ao mesmo tempo que tenta aproveitar os momentos ao lado de sua heroína, por mais que seja para tentar torturá-la.

title.en: Ore no tomodachi ♂♀ ga kawai sugite komaru!

altTitles.en: 俺の友達♂♀が可愛すぎて困る！
My Childhood Friend Is So Cute, It's Frustrating!
I Am Worried That My Childhood Friend Is Too Cute!

altTitles.vi: Người bạn thời thơ ấu của tôi quá dễ thương!

description.en: "If my guy friend turned into a girl, he would be the perfect girlfriend!" Returning to his hometown after 10 years, Amano Koichi is thrilled to finally reunite with his childhood friend, Yukio Sawatari on the first day of school when suddenly, he turns female! Yukio is affected by "Sudden sex change syndrome", a rare condition present in one every ten thousand people which randomly changes their gender!Koichi can't help but be flustered by his childhood friend's cuteness. How will this complicate their relationship? Will it develop into a forbidden romance?! Find out in this exciting TSF Rom-com!
description.id:
Amano, yang kembali ke kota tempat dia tinggal sewaktu kecil untuk pertama kalinya setelah 10 tahun, bertemu Yukio Sawatari, seorang teman masa kecil di hari pertama pemindahan, ketika dia (seorang teman pria) menjadi wanita! Meskipun dia berbagi suka citanya, saat dia tiba-tiba berubah menjadi seorang gadis dan tidak bisa menyembunyikan rasa malunya. Yukio terkena penyakit seperti 100.000 orang lainnya, tiba-tiba menjadi seorang gadis yang disebut "spontaneous isomerism metamorphosis"!  
  
Teman masa kecil perempuan ♂ yang imut dan dalam kesulitan!? Cinta TSF (transeksual) Terlarang!  
  
Kalo gak paham baca ajalah, ada sinopsis juga gak guna.
description.vi:
Khi trở về thành phố nơi từng sống sau 10 năm, Amano Koichi đã gặp lại người bạn tuổi thơ là Yukio Sawatari vào ngày đầu tiên ở trường mới thì bỗng nhiên Yukio lại đổi giới tính?! Anh bị ảnh hưởng bởi một căn bệnh chỉ có trong một trong mười nghìn người gọi là "hội chứng đổi giới đột ngột"! 

Từ đây bắt đầu câu truyện về tình yêu với người bạn tuổi thơ đổi giới.

title.en: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!

altTitles.ja: ドローイング 最強漫画家はお絵かきスキルで異世界無双する！

altTitles.en: Drawing: The Greatest Mangaka Becomes a Skilled “Martial Artist” in Another World

altTitles.zh-hk: 作畫 最強漫畫家利用繪畫技能在異世界開無雙！

altTitles.vi: Drawing: Mangaka Mạnh Nhất Với Kỹ Năng Vẽ Tranh Vô Song Tại Dị Giới

description.en:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
description.ja: 漫画家として大成功を収めていた神代彰は、成功だけに囚われて人間関係を蔑ろにし続けた自分の人生を後悔しながら死んでしまう。そんな彰を待っていたのは、自分で母親を選んで異世界転生するチャンス！？転生した彰は剣術も魔法もダメダメだったが、家族に愛されながら平穏な生活を送っていた。しかしあるとき、「絵を描く」ことでいろいろなものを具現化できるチート能力に気がついてしまって……？
description.vi: Akira, một họa sĩ tài năng nhưng sau khi bị bệnh ung thư anh đã nhận ra xung quanh mình chẳng còn gì ngoại trừ cái danh hiệu "thành công" của mình. Không có người đi cùng mình đến bệnh viện, người mẹ, người thân duy nhất của anh cũng đòi anh đưa tiền mới chịu đi cùng anh. Trong cơn giận anh đã vô tình gây tai nạn và được chuyển sinh sang thế giới khác. Một thế giới mới với một cuộc sống mới anh quyết định sống một cách bình thường và giữ gìn hạnh phúc gia đình nhỏ nhoi của mình
description.pt-br: Akira Kamidai lamenta ter conseguido construir apenas uma relação vazia, embora tenha feito muito sucesso como cartunista. Uma vida em um lugar medíocre onde eu queria que Akira fosse uma pessoa com magia. Reencarnação em uma loja voltada para a esgrima. Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Esgrima! Eu estava vivendo uma vida ideal para uma família amada por espadachins. Descobri a habilidade de trapaça que encarnar várias coisas atravéz de um ”desenho”…? Uma aventura mundial diferente para proteger seu paradeiro, tecida por Akira que quer levar uma vida normal...!

title.en: The Girl with a Kansai Accent and the Pure Boy

altTitles.ja: 関西弁お姉さんと純真少年
The Girl with Kansai-accent and the Pure Boy

altTitles.en: The Kansai Dialect Older Girl & The Pure Boy

description.en: Kizuki-kun, a serious boy who grew up in Toukyou, moves to Oosaka to attend middle school. He lives for free with a friend of his mother's, a Kansai-dialect-speaking chatty adult older girl!
description.pt:
Um garoto se muda de sua cidade, uma amiga de sua mãe com um forte sotaque de Kansaiben cuida dele.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/bakuyahuro)  
- [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/128583)

altTitles.ja: よつばと！

description.en:
Yotsuba is a strange little girl with a big personality! Even in the most trivial, unremarkable encounters, Yotsuba's curiosity and enthusiasm quickly turns the everyday into the extraordinary!

---
- **Won the Excellence Award for Manga at the Japan Media Arts Festival in 2006**


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2007)
description.ru:
Повседневная жизнь Ёцубы Койвай полна приключений. Она активная, любопытная и немного эксцентричная девочка. Настолько эксцентричная, что её отец прозвал её странной и несведущей в вещах, которые должны знать даже пятилетки. Из-за этого самое простое событие для неё становится настоящим приключением. Проходят дни, Ёцуба заводит новых друзей и показывает всем на личном примере, что каждый день может быть в радость.

---

(Source: [shikimori](https://shikimori.one/mangas/104-yotsuba-to))

altTitles.ja: シャーマンキング

description.en:
Yoh Asakura is a shaman–one of the gifted few who, thanks to training or natural talent, can channel spirits that most people can't even see. With the help of his fiancée, Anna, Yoh is in training for the ultimate shaman sports event: the "Shaman Fight in Tokyo," the once-every-500-years tournament to see who can shape humanity's future and become the Shaman King. But unfortunately for Yoh, every shaman in the world is competing for the same prize…


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics (tankoubon) and Elex Media (kanzenban)

altTitles.th: ชายเลวหมื่นลี้ทานตะวัน

altTitles.ja: 負けヒロイン救済計画

description.en:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
description.fr:
Su Lüxia fait partie d'un "Système de rôle féminin".
Sa mission : en se téléportant dans les corps des femmes trompées et bafouées, elle renverse leur destinée.
"Seules les larmes d'un bâtard de tricheur et les gémissements de douleur d'une garce m'apportent le réconfort."
description.it:
Schiacciare un verme per un solo momento dà una soddisfazione momentanea, ma le vite passate a schiacciare i vermi forniscono vite di soddisfazione continua. Su Lüxia, la nostra protagonista femminile, trasmigra in altri mondi con il sistema di contrattacco della seconda protagonista femminile; usa schemi e trucchi elaborati per picchiare innumerevoli bastardi traditori e puttane.

Su Lüxia: "Solo le lacrime di rimorso di un bastardo traditore, e i gemiti di dolore di una puttana incapace di ottenere ciò che vuole, mi danno conforto."

Sistema: "Il mio ospite ha attinto alla sua umanità oggi? No."

altTitles.ja-ro: Cherry Yuusha to Sei Naru Ken

altTitles.en: Cherry Hero and the Holy Sword

altTitles.ja: チェリー勇者と”せい”なる剣

description.en: In a world where heroes are always women chosen by the gods, the legend of a male hero seems to be just a myth. However, when a young boy named Cherio finds himself in the middle of a battle against monsters that threaten humanity, a goddess grants him the power of the male hero and the ability to unsheathe the mythical Holy Sword. Now, he must decide if he is willing to risk his life, not only to save the people he loves, but to fulfill a destiny that no one thought possible.

altTitles.ja: わからないです　吉田さん

description.en:
Tsukumo Yamada is a simple and unremarkable college student. 

As he is getting ready to go home after finishing his university lecture as usual, a solitary beautiful woman, Mao Yoshida, who is rumored to be a "mermaid princess," passes by. While the boys are in an uproar, Yamada is secretly summoned by Yoshida. When they are alone, Yoshida presses against him. In fact, Yamada and Yoshida have an intimate relationship... 

However, he is unable to grasp the romantic distance between them because Yoshida is too expressionless, and he is having a sweet but bittersweet college life, unable to go from "friend" to "lover".
description.ja: 地味で取柄もない大学生の九十九。大学の講義を終え帰宅準備をしていると孤高の美女「吉田真魚」が通りかかる。九十九と吉田さんは親密な関係なのだが、吉田さんが無表情すぎてなかなか関係が進展しないのだった…。
description.es-la: Tsukumo, un estudiante universitario ordinario y sin muchos atributos destacables, vive su día a día con tranquilidad. Pero un dia despues de finalizar sus clases y prepararse para regresar a casa, se cruza con Yoshida Mao, una hermosa y solitaria joven apodada la "Sirena". Entonces, mientras los demás chicos murmuran a su alrededor, Yoshida llama a Tsukumo en secreto. Al encontrarse a solas, Yoshida se acerca a él de manera inesperada. La realidad es que Tsukumo y Yoshida tienen una relación un tanto cercana. Sin embargo, Tsukumo lucha por comprender la distancia romántica entre ellos debido a la inexpresividad de Yoshida, lo que les impide pasar de ser "amigos" a "novios". Así, Tsukumo vive una vida universitaria dulce pero agridulce, intentando navegar entre la amistad y el amor. ¡¡Una serie de Takahashi osamu, autor de Lust Geass!!

altTitles.ja: シガンバナ

description.en:
In this seemingly peaceful country, there lives a hitman that hunts down others of his kind - an assassin of assassins. Before eliminating his targets, he always questions their motives for killing - this is his way of embracing his destiny.

 From the author of "Until Your Bones Rot" and "The Shadows of Who We Once Were," Utsumi Yae presents a thrilling drama about the lives of those existing on the edge between life and death.
description.pt-br:
Neste país aparentemente pacífico, vive um assassino que caça outros de sua espécie - um assassino de assassinos. Antes de eliminar seus alvos, ele sempre questiona seus motivos para matar - esta é sua maneira de abraçar seu destino.

Do autor de "Until Your Bones Rot" e "The Shadows of Who We Once Were", Utsumi Yae apresenta um drama emocionante sobre as vidas daqueles que vivem no limite entre a vida e a morte.

title.en: Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata: Senjou wo Kakeru Kaifuku Youin

altTitles.ja-ro: Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata: Senjou wo Kakeru Kaifuku Youin

altTitles.fr: La mauvaise façon d'utiliser la magie de soin

altTitles.zh: 治愈魔法的错误使用方法

altTitles.ja: 治癒魔法の間違った使い方 ～戦場を駆ける回復要員～

altTitles.zh-hk: 治癒魔法的錯誤使用法～奔赴戰場的治療人員～

altTitles.en: The Wrong Way to Use Healing Magic

altTitles.pt-br: O jeito errado de usar magia de cura

altTitles.vi: Cách Dùng Sai Của Ma Thuật Chữa Trị

description.en:
Usato, an ordinary high schooler, happens to run into two fellow students after school one rainy day. Suddenly, all three of them are engulfed in a magic circle and transported to a fantasy world. There’s just one tiny problem — Usato is simply dragged along by accident!  On top of that, Usato learns that he is capable of using healing magic — an incredibly rare affinity in this new world.

Now Usato must spend his days with the rescue team thugs, struggling through their hellish training regimen — learning the wrong way to use healing magic.

Get ready for an eccentric otherworld fantasy filled with comedy and combat!
description.ja:
**最前線を駆けるのは、常識破りの回復要員！？**

平凡な高校生のウサトは、同じ学校のスズネ、カズキと共に異世界へと転移してしまう。 三人は魔王軍から王国を救うための『勇者』として喚び出された――が、 勇者としての適性を持つのはスズネとカズキだけ。ウサトはただ巻き込まれただけだった！ しかし、ウサトにレア属性の『治癒魔法使い』の素養が見つかったことで事態は一変し…！？ 「小説家になろう」発！　ギャグありバトルありのドタバタ異世界ファンタジー！
description.pt: Usato Ken é um estudante normal do segundo ano do ensino médio. Em um certo dia chuvoso, as duas pessoas mais admiradas do conselho estudantil, Inukami Suzune e Ryuusen Kazuki, percebem que ele não tem um guarda-chuva, então Kazuki empresta o seu para ele. Depois eles acabam conversando enquanto vão embora juntos, mas de repente são convocados para outro mundo como heróis. Parece que Ken foi arrastado pela invocação por acaso, mas ele não pode voltar para a Terra. O que ele fará? Será que vai chorar pelo cantos ou vai agir?
description.ru: Одним дождливым осенним днём жизнь абсолютно заурядного ученика старшей школы Усато Кена перевернулась с ног на голову: вместе с двумя членами школьного совета – президентом Инуками Судзунэ и вице-президентом Рюунзэном Кадзуки Усато-куна призвали в другой мир! После проверки магических способностей наш герой оказывается целителем и попадает в отряд спасателей, командир которого отличается крайне нестандартными методами подготовки…
description.vi: Trong một ngày mưa tầm tã, một học sinh trung học không có bất kỳ tài năng đặc biệt nào, Usato Ken, bị kéo theo một cuộc triệu hồi đến thế giới khác cùng hai người khác, một anh chàng đẹp trai và một cô gái xinh đẹp mà cậu mới làm quen. Cậu bị ép tham gia một khóa đào tạo địa ngục vì khả năng của mình như một healer
description.pt-br: Usato Ken é um estudante normal do segundo ano do ensino médio. Em um certo dia chuvoso, as duas pessoas mais admiradas do conselho estudantil, Inukami Suzune e Ryuusen Kazuki, percebem que ele não tem um guarda-chuva, então Kazuki empresta o seu para ele. Depois eles acabam conversando enquanto vão embora juntos, mas de repente são convocados para outro mundo como heróis. Parece que Ken foi arrastado pela invocação por acaso, mas ele não pode voltar para a Terra. O que ele fará? Será que vai chorar pelo cantos ou vai agir?

altTitles.ja: 彼女、お借りします

altTitles.de: Ich würde mir gerne eine Freundin ausleihen

altTitles.th: สะดุดรักยัยแฟนเช่า

altTitles.vi: Dịch Vụ Cho Thuê Bạn Gái

description.en:
Kinoshita Kazuya is a regular college student who was just dumped by his girlfriend for another guy. Feeling down in the dumps, he decides to use an app called Diamond to hire Mizuhara Chizuru, a rental girlfriend, to make himself feel better. From their first meeting, she seems to be the perfect girl for him, but is there more to her than meets the eye? And how will their not quite typical relationship develop?
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
description.fr: Kinoshita Kazuya est un étudiant régulier qui vient d'être largué par sa petite amie pour un autre gars. Se sentant dans les décharges, il décide d'utiliser une application appelée Diamond pour embaucher Mizuhara Chizuru, une petite amie de location, afin de se sentir mieux. Dès leur première rencontre, elle semble être la fille parfaite pour lui, mais est-ce qu'il y a autre chose pour elle que ce qui est à l'oeil? Et comment va se développer leur relation pas tout à fait typique?
description.it: Kinoshita Kazuya è un normale studente universitario che è stato appena lasciato dalla sua ragazza. Devastato, decide di usare un app chiamata "Diamond" per reclutare Mizuhara Chizuru, una ragazza a noleggio per tirargli su il morale. Fin dal loro primo incontro, sembra essere la ragazza perfetta per lui, ma ci sarà altro dietro a quell'immagine da "brava ragazza"…? E come si evolverà la loro inusuale relazione?
description.ja: 都内在住のダメダメ大学生、木ノ下和也（20）。ある日、“ワケアリ”の超絶美少女、水原千鶴との出会いをキッカケに、彼の人生は大きく変わり始めて──！？
description.pt: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar uma aplicação de relacionamentos depois de ter levado terminado com a sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!
description.ru: Двадцатилетний никудышный студент университета муниципального района Киносита Кадзуя. Встреча с «особенной» красавицей ознаменует начало изменений в его жизни?!
description.es-la: Kinoshita Kazuya es un estudiante universitario normal al que su novia acaba de dejar por otro chico. Sintiéndose deprimido, decide usar una aplicación llamada Diamond para contratar a Mizuhara Chizuru, una novia de alquiler, para sentirse mejor. Desde su primer encuentro con ella, parece ser la chica perfecta para él, pero ¿hay más en ella de lo que parece? ¿Y cómo se desarrollará su relación no muy típica?
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar um aplicativo de relacionamentos depois de ter levado um fora de sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!

altTitles.ja: にじいろフォトグラフ

description.en: Yamabuki Aoi is an exceedingly withdrawn first-year high school student who lives together with her older sister Satsuki, a popular novelist. What will happen to their daily lives when, due to certain circumstances, Sara Flory, a little foreign girl, begins to live together with them?
description.it: Yamabuki Aoi è una studentessa del primo anno delle superiori, eccessivamente timorosa che vive con sua sorella maggiore Satsuki, una famosa scrittrice. Date varie circostanze Sara Flory, una bimba straniera inizierà a vivere con loro.. Come influirà questa novità nelle routine delle due sorelle? Cosa accadrà?
description.es-la: Yamabuki Aoi es una estudiante de secundaria de primer año sumamente retraída que vive junta con su hermana mayor Satsuki, una novelista popular. ¿Qué pasará con su vida diaria cuando, debido a ciertas circunstancias, Sara Flory, una pequeña niña extranjera, comience a vivir con ellos?

altTitles.ja: さよなら絶望先生

altTitles.th: ซาโยนาระ คุณครูผู้สิ้นหวัง

description.en: Nozomu Itoshiki is a high school teacher so pessimistic that even the smallest of misfortunes can send him into a pit of raging despair; some of these "catastrophes" even lead to suicide attempts. Sayonara Zetsubou Sensei is a satirical slice-of-life comedy set in the modern day, covering various aspects of Japanese life and culture through Nozomu and his interactions with his students: Kiri Komori, a recluse who refuses to leave the school; Abiru Kobushi, an enigma who frequently arrives to class with severe and mysterious injuries; the hyper-optimistic Kafuuka Fuura, Nozomu's polar opposite; and several other unusual girls, all of whom are just as eccentric as their teacher.

Jo Ja-Hyun (Jay) is the student president of Taeyang (Sunny) High. He is not just a smart student but an extreme biker with high techniques. As you follow his bike, you will meet his friends, love, and adventures.

---

**Contents:**
- **Season 1:** 65 Chapters + Prologue + Special (0-65)
- **Season 2.1:** 65 Chapters + Prologue (66-130)
- **Season 2.2:** 117 Chapters (131-257)
- **Season 3:** 128 Chapters (258-375)
- **Season 4:** 53 Chapters (Ongoing) (376-)
description.fr:
Nous suivons l’histoire de Jay un jeune lycéen étudiant et président du conseil des élèves de la Sunny High.

Alors qu’il était en train de faire du vélo, ce dernier se fera rapidement repérer par Minu, membre de la Zephyrus Crew, un groupe de cycliste. Le jeune homme ayant été impressionné par les compétences de Jay tentera de le recruter dans son équipe, chose que le président du conseil des élèves refusera catégoriquement.

Voyant les nombreux refus de ce dernier, Minu abandonnera l’idée de le recruter et lui proposera simplement de faire une course contre TJ, également membre de la Zephyrus Crew. Alors que Jay s’apprêtait à décliné son offre, Minu lui dira que ce fameux TJ a insulté son vélo, disant qu’il ne s’agissait que d’un tas de ferraille. Fou de rage, Jay acceptera finalement de prendre part à la course…
description.pt: Jo Ja-Hyun (Jay) é o Presidente do Conselho estudantil da Taeyang (Sunny) High. ele não é somente um aluno inletigente mas um ciclista incrível com ótimas técnicas. enquanto você segue a bicicleta dele, irá conhecer seus amigos, amor e as aventuras.

altTitles.ja: 銃夢火星戦記

description.en: Third part of the Gunnm series after GUNNM and GUNNM Last Order.

title.en: ORIGINAL CHRONICLE Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The 1st

altTitles.ja: ORIGINAL CHRONICLE 魔法少女リリカルなのはThe 1st

description.en: The supplemental manga for Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha Movie 1st, adding scenes inspired by both the original anime season and its Sound Stages into the movie verse.

The only choice: to save you.  

Yoo Seoha, the 'Child of the Dragon,' possesses a mystical ability to foresee the destiny of those destined to rule.  

['The Child of the Dragon envisions a *righteous king* and pleads to abandon the *warlord*.']  

To protect the one she loves, Seoha makes an irreversible decision.  
As a result, Wu is branded a traitor and forced to flee, while Myung ascends to the throne and claims Seoha as his own.  

Ten years later, Wu resurfaces to reclaim what was taken from him, while Myung is determined not to let anything slip through his grasp again...
description.ko:
선택은 오직 하나, 그대를 살리는 것.
임금이 될 자의 앞날을 보는
신묘한 능력을 지닌 '용의 아이' 유서하.

['용의 아이'는 '의왕'을 그리고 있으니
'무신'을 사하길 바라옵니다.]

서하는 사랑하는 이를 지키고자, 돌이킬 수 없는 선택을 한다.
그로 인해 대역죄인의 누명을 쓰고 도망자가 된 우와
왕의 자리에 올라 서하를 차지한 명.

10년 후,
자신의 것을 되찾고자 우가 세상에 모습을 드러내고
명은 다시 나타난 우에게 무엇도 빼앗기지 않으려 하는데…

altTitles.ja: ゴーストフィクサーズ

description.en: Following a certain event, Mikurigaoka New Town transformed into a crucible of supernatural phenomena known as GHOSTS! In said town lives Hifumi, a middle school boy, who one day encounters a girl who just moved in... Help "correct" the supernatural in this action-packed tale from Yasuki Tanaka, creator of "Summer Time Rendering"!

title.en: Bouken ni wa, Buki ga Hitsuyou da! ~Kodawari Rudy no Kajiya Gurashi~

altTitles.ja: 冒険には、武器が必要だ！～こだわりルディの鍛冶屋ぐらし～

altTitles.ja-ro: Bouken ni ha, Buki ga Hitsuyou da! ~Kodawari Rudy no Kajiya Gurashi~

altTitles.en: Every Adventure Needs Weapons!: The Meticulous Rudy's Blacksmith Life

altTitles.vi: Khi phiêu lưu, vũ khí là thứ không thể thiếu! ~ Cuộc sống thợ rèn của Rudy kỹ tính ~

description.en: A young girl Rudy may dream of becoming the greatest weaponsmith in the world, but right now she's just an apprentice at a hardware store. She can't help getting scolded by her master for crafting the craziest weapons! In this dungeon-city where heroes dare to delve, experience the everyday life of the regular folk that keep things running smoothly! Welcome to your "Craft Fantasy!"
description.ja: 迷宮前町の金物屋で働く見習いの少女・ルディは親方に怒られながらも奇想天外な武器を作って、世界一の鍛冶職人を目指して奮闘中。 迷宮の外側の街で冒険を支える普通の人々の日常を描くクラフト・ファンタジー！
description.pt-br: Uma jovem chamada Rudy pode sonhar em se tornar a melhor armeira do mundo, mas, no momento, ela é apenas uma aprendiz em uma loja de ferramentas. Ela não consegue evitar levar broncas de seu mestre por criar as armas mais malucas! Nesta cidade-dungeon onde heróis se aventuram, vivencie o dia a dia das pessoas comuns que mantêm tudo funcionando perfeitamente! Bem-vindo ao seu "Craft Fantasy!"

altTitles.vi: Hãy gọi tôi là gấu trúc đỏ

description.en:
Red panda housekeeping! "Hello, sir! Is this the service you ordered?" What's this? It's way too cute!!  
  
[Motion comic](https://www.bilibili.com/bangumi/play/ss26507)

altTitles.ja: かさねがさねの初恋ですが

altTitles.vi: Tình Đầu, Lại Thêm Tình Đầu

description.en: Hassaku Tamao came back to his hometown to teach and fulfill a promise he made when he was younger. However, he's not the only one who remembers a promise he made...

altTitles.ja: マダラランブル

description.en:
In modern Japan, where "vampires" that mimic humans and prey on them run rampant, there are girls who secretly fight these creatures, armed with silver weapons! Among the vampire exterminators is a team known as the "Madara-sou," a unit notorious for being full of "troublemakers." Newly assigned to this group is Reo, a girl with a certain secret. There, she encounters Kaika Kiriya, a woman who's particularly "dangerous," even among the eccentric residents of Madara-sou.

A thrilling, over-the-top, and occasionally heartwarming tale of friendship. Hunt, hunt, hunt! A girly vampire action story!
description.ja: 人に擬態し、人を喰う「吸血鬼」が跋扈する現代日本。ヤツらを狩るため、銀武器片手に人知れず戦う少女たちがいた！駆除業者の中でも問題児が集まった部隊・即応六班――通称「まだら荘」。吸血鬼を引き寄せる「ごちそう」体質を持ち、人を遠ざけ生きてきた昴 玲央がそこで出会ったのは、まだら荘の中でも一際美しく一際ヤバイ女・紀里谷 開花でーー。

altTitles.ja: ナイトメア・メーカー

altTitles.ja-ro: Sekai wa Subete Kimi no Mono

description.en: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality…
description.ja: 天才発明家高校生の内田は､夢に願望を投影できる夢見装置を開発｡誰もが装置の虜になっていく､レム催眠誘導型リアル体感システム始動!!

title.en: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples

altTitles.zh: 天生媚骨的我被病娇徒儿盯上了

altTitles.zh-ro: Tiansheng Meigu De Wo Bei Bing Jiao Tu Er Ding Shangle
Tiānshēng Mèigǔ De Wǒ Bèi Bìng Jiāo Tú Er Dīng Shàngle

altTitles.vi: Trời Sinh Mị Cốt, Ta Bị Đồ Nhi Yandere Để Mắt Tới

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?

altTitles.th: สนามเด็กล่า

altTitles.pt-br: Uma Sensação de Diversão com seus brinquedos

description.en:
Lee Myung-jun, the Vice Chairman of Hyundo Group, lost his daughter to a group of bullies. Seeking revenge, he adopts Yoon Karma, a psychopathic defector girl.

Yoon Karma: A sadistic human weapon created through drug experiments in North Korea. After killing everyone in the research lab, she escaped to South Korea on her own.

Having just been released from a juvenile detention center in South Korea, Yoon Karma sets out to hunt down the bullies at school, driven by the desire to avenge her new father and satisfy her sadistic pleasures.
description.pt-br:
Lee Myung-jun, o vice-presidente do grupo Hyundo, perdeu sua filha para um grupo de pessoas que faziam bullying. Buscando vingança, ele adota Yoon Karma, uma garota desertora psicopata.
Yoon Karma: Uma arma humana sádica criada por meio de experimentos com drogas na Coreia do Norte. Depois de matar todos no laboratório de pesquisa, ela escapou para a Coreia do Sul sozinha.
Tendo acabado de ser libertada de um centro de detenção juvenil na Coreia do Sul, Yoon Karma sai para caçar os valentões na escola, movida pelo desejo de vingar seu novo pai e satisfazer seus prazeres sádicos.

description.en:
Humanity was designated as a disruptive species of the Cosmic Ecosystem.
To reduce humanity's numbers, the universe's administrators initiate a survival game.

Jin Jaehee, having returned from the final stage of the game, reaches one clear conclusion:
"Kang Shion, only he can lead us to victory in this game."

Kang Shion, a genius with an unparalleled mind.
Jin Jaehee, a regressor who lost in the survival game and returned to the past.

With the regressor as his ally, Kang Shion begins to unravel the death game with unprecedented skill.

altTitles.ja: スロウモーニング

description.en: A story about two people who had a crush on each other in high school, who meet again as adults.

altTitles.ja: ひろみ

description.en: The sins of the past still bleeds to this day. Unforgivable, indelible, throbbing pain. Shuzo Oshimi's new two-parter one shot on sin!
description.ja:
あの日の罪は、今でも血を流している。

赦されることなく、
風化することなく、疼く痛み。
鬼才が“罪の原風景”を描き出す!!

押見修造 罪悪読切シリーズ!?
